scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development tsx src/preflight.ts && NODE_ENV=development tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.dev:test: PORT=4001 DB_PORT=5435 NODE_ENV=test tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.test:integration:docker: npm run db:test:up && npm run test:integration && npm run db:test:down
scripts.db:dev:kill: docker compose -p nubase-dev -f docker/dev/docker-compose.yml down -v && rm -rf docker/dev/postgresql-data
scripts.db:dev:reset: npm run db:dev:kill && npm run db:schema-sync && npm run db:dev:up && sleep 5 && npm run db:dev:seed
scripts.db:test:kill: docker compose -p nubase-test -f docker/test/docker-compose.yml down -v && rm -rf docker/test/postgresql-data
scripts.db:test:reset: npm run db:test:kill && npm run db:schema-sync && npm run db:test:up
scripts.db:schema-sync: mkdir -p docker/dev/postgresql-init/sql docker/test/postgresql-init/sql && cp db/nubase-db-schema.sql db/data-db-schema.sql docker/dev/postgresql-init/sql/ && cp db/nubase-db-schema.sql db/data-db-schema.sql docker/test/postgresql-init/sql/ && cp db/init-databases.sh docker/dev/postgresql-init/ && cp db/init-databases.sh docker/test/postgresql-init/
